'''1.5.1 Build 15''' is the fifteenth build for {{El|MinecraftEdu}} 1.5.1, released on June 5, 2013. It is based on [[Java Edition 1.5.1]].

==Additions==
*Ability to toggle Build Tools and Creative Gamemode for individual students through the User Management [[Teacher Menu]].
